title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2599/85 of 16 September 1985 amending for the fifth time Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 determining the classification of vine varieties
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2599/85
of 16 September 1985
amending for the fifth time Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 determining the classification of vine varieties
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 September 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 89, 29. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 381, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 175, 5. 7. 1985, p. 9.
(5) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 75.
ANNEX
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 is amended as follows:
I. In Title I, sub-title I, point IV 'France' the following vine varieties are to be inserted in the correct alphabetical order:
4. Department of the Alpes de Haute-Provence:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
5. Department of the Hautes-Alpes:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
6. Department of the Alpes-Maritimes:
'Odola No (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
7. Department of the Ardèche:
subparagraph A:
'Odola No (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties,
subparagraph B:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
9. Department of the Ariège:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
11. Department of the Aude:
subparagraph A:
- 'Arinarnoa N' is added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (**)' and 'Odola N (), are deleted from the class of authorized varieties;
subparagraph B:
- 'Arinarnoa N' is added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (*)' and 'Odola N (**)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
12. Department of the Aveyron:
- 'Arinarnoa B', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (*)', 'Liliorila B (*)', 'Perdea B (*)', 'Semebat N (*)' and 'Odola N (**)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
13. Department of the Bouches-du-Rhône:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
15. Department of Cantal:
subparagraph A:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
16. Department of the Charente:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B', 'Semebat B' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
19. Department of Corrèze:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
20. Departments of the Haute-Corse and the Corse du Sud:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties. 24. Department of Dordogne:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Colombard B', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B,' 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Colombard B', 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Perdea B (***)', 'Semebat N (***)' and 'Odola N (**)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
26. Department of the Drôme:
subparagraph A:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties;
subparagraph B:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
30. Department of the Gard:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
31. Department of the Haute-Garonne:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N ()', 'Liliorila B ()', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B ()' and 'Semebat N ()' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
32. Department of the Gers:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N ()', 'Liliorila B ()', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B ()' and 'Semebat N ()' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
33. Department of Gironde:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Odola N (**)' and 'Perdea B (***)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
34. Department of the Hérault:
Instead of:
'Same vine varieties as for the Department of the Gard. In addition, the variety Tombat B is recommended the varieties Servant B (*) and Arinarnoa N () are authorized',
Read:
'Same vine varieties as for the Department of the Gard. In addition, the varieties Tombat B and Arinarnoa N are recommended; the variety Servant B is authorized'.
36. Department of the Indre:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
37. Department of the Indre-et-Loire:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
38. Department of the Isère:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
40. Department of the Landes:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B,' 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (***), 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B (***)' and 'Semebat N (***)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
41. Department of the Loir-et-Cher:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
42. Department of the Loire:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
44. Department of the Loire-Atlantique:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
45. Department of the Loiret:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties. 46. Department of the Lot:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (***)', 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B (***)' and 'Semebat N (***)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
47. Department of the Lot-et-Garonne:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Colombard B', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (***)', 'Colombard B', 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B (***)' and 'Semebat N (***)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
49. Department of the Maine-et-Loire:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
64. Department of the Pyrénées-Atlantique:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (**)', 'Liliorila B (**)', 'Odola N (***)', 'Perdea B (***)' and 'Semebat N (**)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
72. Department of the Sarthe:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
73. Department of the Savoie:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
79. Department of the Deux-Sèvres:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
81. Department of the Tarn:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (***)', 'Liliorila B (***)', 'Odola N (**)', 'Perdea B (***)' and 'Semebat N (***)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
82. Department of the Tarn-et-Garonne:
- 'Arinarnoa N', 'Liliorila B', 'Perdea B' and 'Semebat N' are added to the class of recommended varieties,
- 'Arinarnoa N (*)', 'Liliorila B (*), 'Odola N (***)', 'Perdea B (*)' and 'Semebat N (*)' are deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
83. Department of the Var:
'Odola N (***)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
84. Department of the Vaucluse:
'Odola N (***)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
85. Department of the Vendée:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
86. Department of the Vienne:
'Odola N (**)' is deleted from the class of authorized varieties.
II. Title I, Sub-Title I, point VIII 'United Kingdom' is amended as follows, the vine varieties being inserted in the correct alphabetical order:
Under '(b) Authorized vine varieties' Reichensteiner (*) and Schonburger (*) are added.
(*) Added under Article 11 (1) (b) of Regulation (EEC) No 347/79 with effect from 20 September 1985.
